## Vector4.equalsToFloats() method

Boolean : True if the given floats are strictly equal to the current Vector4 coordinates.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
equalsToFloats(x: number, y: number, z: number, w: number): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  x | <code>number</code> | x value to compare against |
|  y | <code>number</code> | y value to compare against |
|  z | <code>number</code> | z value to compare against |
|  w | <code>number</code> | w value to compare against |

<b>Returns:</b>

`boolean`

true if equal
